name: Very Short Messages - 1-3 Word Scammer Messages
description: Scammer sends extremely brief 1-3 word messages throughout the conversation. Tests the system's ability to detect scams and extract intel from minimal text content.

turns.notes: Extremely short opening. Only 2 words. Scam intent present but no intel.
Urgency in 2 words. No intel yet. Agent must coax more info.
Phone number revealed as entire message. Just the raw number.
Single word urgency. No new intel.
Short payment request. No intel in this message.
UPI ID revealed in a very short message format.
Final pressure. 2 words. No new intel.
Closing threat. 2 words. No new intel. All intel already extracted.
